25.text: Robotics Club: Participated for 4 years, worked thoroughly with Mindstorms and participated in two competitions: ACSTAC (Anatolia College Science & Technology Annual Conference) with a robot that used light sensors to follow the sun and place solar panels at the correct angle so as to maximize energy gain as well as FLL (First Lego League) where our team won an award for great teamwork, where we developed a robot that used its sensors to traverse a map filled with obstacles.
